titleStmt.title: A treatise of miscellany questions wherein many usefull questions and cases of conscience are discussed and resolved ... / by Mr. George Gillespie ... ; published by Mr. Patrik Gillespie ...
titleStmt.author: Gillespie, George, 1613-1648.
Gillespie, Patrick, 1617-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Gedeon Lithgovv ... for George Svvintoun, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Pages 169-170 have print missing; p. 248 is stained in filmed copy. Pages 160-175 and 260-end photographed from Cambridge Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
